xml:
Tridestra<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms in women with a uterus

Osteoporosis prophylaxis in women with a uterus

By mouth

  • Adult

    1 tablet daily for 70 days, white tablet to be taken, then 1 tablet daily for 14 days, blue tablet to be taken, then 1 tablet daily for 7 days, yellow tablet to be taken, subsequent courses are repeated without interval.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
